name: Mysterious Island - A Hidden Object Adventure
name_original: Mysterious Island - A Hidden Object Adventure
description:
"Mysterious Island - An Adventure in Search of Objects" is a game in the genre of "hidden object". By the will of fate, you find yourself on a desert island. You have to search for supplies, fight with predators, explore the surroundings — do everything to survive in this paradise trap, uncover all the secrets of the Mysterious Island and wait for help to arrive!

A mysterious island awaits you:

  • ten hand-drawn locations
  • three levels of difficulty
  • meditative, addictive gameplay
  • atmospheric music
